agessc.comment: Time elapsed since water was last in surface layer of the ocean.
agessc.long_name: Sea Water Age Since Surface Contact

arag.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
arag.comment: Sum of particulate aragonite components (e.g. Phytoplankton, Detrital, etc.)

bacc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
bacc.comment: Sum of bacterial carbon component concentrations

bfe.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
bfe.comment: Sum of particulate organic iron component concentrations

bigthetao.comment: Sea water conservative temperature (this should be contributed only for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field)

bigthetaoga.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
bigthetaoga.comment: Diagnostic should be contributed only for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.
bigthetaoga.long_name: Global Average Sea Water Conservative Temperature

bsi.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
bsi.comment: Sum of particulate silica component concentrations

calc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
calc.comment: Sum of particulate calcite component concentrations (e.g. Phytoplankton, Detrital, etc.)

cfc11.long_name: Moles Per Unit Mass of CFC-11 in Sea Water

cfc12.long_name: Moles Per Unit Mass of CFC-12 in Sea Water

chl.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
chl.comment: Sum of chlorophyll from all phytoplankton group concentrations.  In most models this is equal to chldiat+chlmisc, that is the sum of Diatom Chlorophyll Mass Concentration and Other Phytoplankton Chlorophyll Mass Concentration

chlcalc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
chlcalc.comment: chlorophyll concentration from the calcite-producing phytoplankton component alone
chlcalc.long_name: Mass Concentration of Calcareous Phytoplankton expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water

chldiat.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
chldiat.comment: Chlorophyll from diatom phytoplankton component concentration alone

chldiaz.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
chldiaz.comment: Chlorophyll concentration from the diazotrophic phytoplankton component alone
chldiaz.long_name: Mass Concentration of Diazotrophs expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water

chlmisc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
chlmisc.comment: Chlorophyll from additional phytoplankton component concentrations alone

chlpico.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
chlpico.comment: chlorophyll concentration from the picophytoplankton (<2 um) component alone
chlpico.long_name: Mass Concentration of Picophytoplankton expressed as Chlorophyll in Sea Water

co3.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
co3.long_name: Mole Concentration of Carbonate ion in Seawater

co3satarag.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
co3satarag.long_name: Mole Concentration of Carbonate ion for Seawater in equilibrium with pure Aragonite

co3satcalc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
co3satcalc.long_name: Mole Concentration of Carbonate ion for Seawater in equilibrium with pure Calcite

depth.long_name: Sea Floor Depth: formula term: thetao

detoc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
detoc.comment: Sum of detrital organic carbon component concentrations

dfe.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
dfe.comment: Dissolved iron in sea water,  including both Fe2+ and Fe3+ ions (but not particulate detrital iron)

dissi14cabio.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

dissic.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

dissicabio.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

dissicnat.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
dissicnat.comment: Dissolved inorganic carbon (CO3+HCO3+H2CO3) concentration at preindustrial atmospheric xCO2

dissoc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
dissoc.comment: Sum of dissolved carbon component concentrations explicitly represented (i.e. not ~40 uM refractory unless explicit)

dmso.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
dmso.comment: Mole concentration of dimethyl sulphide in water

dpco2.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

dpo2.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

eta.long_name: Sea Surface Height formula term: thetao

evs.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where ice_free_sea over sea
evs.comment: computed as the total mass of water vapor evaporating from the ice-free portion of the ocean  divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
evs.long_name: Water Evaporation Flux Where Ice Free Ocean over Sea

exparag100.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

expc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
expc.comment: Downward flux of particulate organic carbon

expc100.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
expc100.comment: Downward flux of particulate organic carbon at 100m
expc100.long_name: Downward Flux of Particle Organic Carbon

expcalc100.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

expfe100.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

expn100.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

expp100.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

expsi100.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

fbddtalk.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fbddtalk.comment: vertical integral of net biological terms in time rate of change of alkalinity
fbddtalk.long_name: Rate of Change of Biological Alkalinity due to Biological Activity

fbddtdic.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fbddtdic.comment: vertical integral of net biological terms in time rate of change of dissolved inorganic carbon
fbddtdic.long_name: Rate of Change of Dissolved Inorganic Carbon due to Biological Activity

fbddtdife.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fbddtdife.comment: vertical integral of net biological terms in time rate of change of dissolved inorganic iron
fbddtdife.long_name: Rate of Change of Dissolved Inorganic Iron due to Biological Activity

fbddtdin.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fbddtdin.comment: vertical integral of net biological terms in time rate of change of nitrogen nutrients (e.g. NO3+NH4)
fbddtdin.long_name: Rate of Change of Dissolved Inorganic Nitrogen due to Biological Activity

fbddtdip.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fbddtdip.comment: vertical integral of net biological terms in time rate of change of phosphate
fbddtdip.long_name: Rate of Change of Dissolved Inorganic Phosphate due to Biological Activity

fbddtdisi.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fbddtdisi.comment: vertical integral of net biological terms in time rate of change of dissolved inorganic silicate
fbddtdisi.long_name: Rate of Change of Dissolved Inorganic Silicate due to Biological Activity

fddtalk.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fddtalk.comment: vertical integral of net time rate of change of alkalinity

fddtdic.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fddtdic.long_name: Rate of Change of Net Dissolved Inorganic Carbon

fddtdife.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fddtdife.comment: vertical integral of net time rate of change of dissolved inorganic iron
fddtdife.long_name: Rate of Change of Net Dissolved Inorganic Iron

fddtdin.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fddtdin.comment: Net time rate of change of nitrogen nutrients (e.g. NO3+NH4)
fddtdin.long_name: Rate of Change of Net Dissolved Inorganic Nitrogen

fddtdip.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fddtdip.comment: vertical integral of net  time rate of change of phosphate
fddtdip.long_name: Rate of Change of Net Dissolved Inorganic Phosphate

fddtdisi.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fddtdisi.comment: vertical integral of net time rate of change of dissolved inorganic silicate
fddtdisi.long_name: Rate of Change of Net Dissolved Inorganic Silicate

fg14co2abio.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fg14co2abio.comment: Gas exchange flux of abiotic 14CO2 (positive into ocean)

fgcfc11.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

fgcfc12.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

fgco2.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fgco2.comment: Gas exchange flux of CO2 (positive into ocean)

fgco2abio.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fgco2abio.comment: Gas exchange flux of abiotic CO2 (positive into ocean)

fgco2nat.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fgco2nat.comment: Gas exchange flux of natural CO2 (positive into ocean)

fgdms.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fgdms.comment: Gas exchange flux of DMS (positive into atmosphere)

fgo2.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fgo2.comment: Gas exchange flux of O2 (positive into ocean)

fgsf6.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

ficeberg.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
ficeberg.comment: computed as the iceberg melt water  flux into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
ficeberg.long_name: Water Flux into Sea Water From Icebergs

ficeberg2d.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
ficeberg2d.comment: computed as the iceberg melt water  flux into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
ficeberg2d.long_name: Water Flux into Sea Water From Icebergs

frfe.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

fric.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fric.long_name: Downward Inorganic Carbon Flux at Ocean Bottom

friver.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
friver.comment: computed as the river flux of water into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
friver.long_name: Water Flux into Sea Water From Rivers

frn.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
frn.long_name: Nitrogen Loss to Sediments and through Denitrification

froc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
froc.long_name: Downward Organic Carbon Flux at Ocean Bottom

fsfe.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fsfe.comment: Iron supply through deposition flux onto sea surface, runoff, coasts, sediments, etc
fsfe.long_name: Surface Downward Net Flux of Iron

fsitherm.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fsitherm.comment: computed as the sea ice thermodynamic water flux into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
fsitherm.long_name: Water Flux into Sea Water due to Sea Ice Thermodynamics

fsn.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
fsn.long_name: Surface Downward Net Flux of Nitrogen

graz.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
graz.long_name: Total Grazing of Phytoplankton by Zooplankton

hfbasin.comment: Contains contributions from all physical processes affecting the northward heat transport, including resolved advection, parameterized advection, lateral diffusion, etc. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.   Use Celsius for temperature scale.

hfbasinpadv.comment: Contributions to heat transport from parameterized eddy-induced advective transport due to any subgrid advective process. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.  Use Celsius for temperature scale.
hfbasinpadv.long_name: northward ocean heat transport due to parameterized eddy advection

hfbasinpmadv.comment: Contributions to heat transport from parameterized mesoscale eddy-induced advective transport. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.  Use Celsius for temperature scale.
hfbasinpmadv.long_name: northward ocean heat transport due to parameterized mesoscale advection

hfbasinpmdiff.comment: Contributions to heat transport from parameterized mesoscale eddy-induced diffusive transport (i.e., neutral diffusion). Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.
hfbasinpmdiff.long_name: northward ocean heat transport due to parameterized mesoscale diffusion

hfbasinpsmadv.comment: Contributions to heat transport from parameterized mesoscale eddy-induced advective transport. Diagnosed here as a function of latitude and basin.  Use Celsius for temperature scale.
hfbasinpsmadv.long_name: northward ocean heat transport due to parameterized submesoscale advection

hfcorr.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

hfds.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
hfds.comment: This is the net flux of heat entering the liquid water column through its upper surface (excluding any 'flux adjustment') .
hfds.long_name: Downward Heat Flux at Sea Water Surface

hfevapds.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where ice_free_sea over sea
hfevapds.comment: This is defined as 'where ice_free_sea over sea'
hfevapds.long_name: Temperature Flux due to Evaporation Expressed as Heat Flux Out of Sea Water

hfgeou.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
hfgeou.long_name: Upward Geothermal Heat Flux at Sea Floor

hfibthermds.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
hfibthermds.long_name: Heat Flux into Sea Water due to Iceberg Thermodynamics

hfibthermds2d.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
hfibthermds2d.long_name: Heat Flux into Sea Water due to Iceberg Thermodynamics

hfls.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where ice_free_sea over sea

hfrainds.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where ice_free_sea over sea
hfrainds.comment: This is defined as 'where ice_free_sea over sea'; i.e., the total flux (considered here) entering the ice-free portion of the grid cell divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.  All such heat fluxes are computed based on Celsius scale.
hfrainds.long_name: Temperature Flux due to Rainfall Expressed as Heat Flux into Sea Water

hfrunoffds.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
hfrunoffds.long_name: Temperature Flux due to Runoff Expressed as Heat Flux into Sea Water

hfrunoffds2d.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
hfrunoffds2d.long_name: Temperature Flux due to Runoff Expressed as Heat Flux into Sea Water

hfsifrazil.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
hfsifrazil.long_name: Heat Flux into Sea Water due to Frazil Ice Formation

hfsifrazil2d.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
hfsifrazil2d.long_name: Heat Flux into Sea Water due to Frazil Ice Formation

hfsithermds.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
hfsithermds.long_name: Heat Flux into Sea Water due to Sea Ice Thermodynamics

hfsithermds2d.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
hfsithermds2d.long_name: Heat Flux into Sea Water due to Sea Ice Thermodynamics

hfsnthermds.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
hfsnthermds.long_name: Heat Flux into Sea Water due to Snow Thermodynamics

hfsnthermds2d.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
hfsnthermds2d.long_name: Heat Flux into Sea Water due to Snow Thermodynamics

hfss.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where ice_free_sea over sea
hfss.comment: This is defined as 'where ice_free_sea over sea'

hfx.comment: Contains all contributions to 'x-ward' heat transport from resolved and parameterized processes.  Use Celsius for temperature scale.

hfy.comment: Contains all contributions to 'y-ward' heat transport from resolved and parameterized processes. Use Celsius for temperature scale.

htovgyre.comment: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.
htovgyre.long_name: Northward Ocean Heat Transport due to Gyre

htovovrt.comment: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.
htovovrt.long_name: Northward Ocean Heat Transport due to Overturning

icfriver.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
icfriver.comment: Inorganic Carbon supply to ocean through runoff (separate from gas exchange)
icfriver.long_name: Flux of Inorganic Carbon Into Ocean Surface by Runoff

intdissic.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

intdissoc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

intparag.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

intpbfe.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

intpbn.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

intpbp.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

intpbsi.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

intpcalcite.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

intpn2.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

intpnitrate.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
intpnitrate.comment: Vertically integrated primary (organic carbon) production by phytoplankton based on nitrate uptake alone
intpnitrate.long_name: Primary Organic Carbon Production by Phytoplankton Based on Nitrate Uptake Alone

intpoc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

intpp.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
intpp.comment: Vertically integrated total primary (organic carbon) production by phytoplankton.  This should equal the sum of intpdiat+intpphymisc, but those individual components may be unavailable in some models.
intpp.long_name: Primary Organic Carbon Production by All Types of Phytoplankton

intppcalc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
intppcalc.long_name: Net Primary Mole Productivity of Carbon by Calcareous Phytoplankton

intppdiat.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
intppdiat.comment: Vertically integrated primary (organic carbon) production by the diatom phytoplankton component alone
intppdiat.long_name: Primary Organic Carbon Production by Diatoms

intppdiaz.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
intppdiaz.long_name: Net Primary Mole Productivity of Carbon by Diazotrophs

intppmisc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
intppmisc.comment: Vertically integrated total primary (organic carbon) production by other phytoplankton components alone
intppmisc.long_name: Primary Organic Carbon Production by Other Phytoplankton

intpppico.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
intpppico.long_name: Net Primary Mole Productivity of Carbon by Picophytoplankton

limfecalc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

limfediat.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

limfediaz.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

limfemisc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

limfepico.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

limirrcalc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

limirrdiat.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

limirrdiaz.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

limirrmisc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

limirrpico.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

limncalc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

limndiat.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

limndiaz.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

limnmisc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

limnpico.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

masscello.comment: Tracer grid-cell mass per unit area used for computing tracer budgets. For Boussinesq models with static ocean grid cell thickness, masscello = rhozero*thickcello, where thickcello is static cell thickness and rhozero is constant Boussinesq reference density. More generally, masscello is time dependent and reported as part of Omon.
masscello.long_name: Sea Water Mass Per Unit Area

masso.cell_measures: time: mean area: sum where sea
masso.comment: Total mass of liquid seawater. For Boussinesq models, report this diagnostic as Boussinesq reference density times total volume.

mlotst.comment: Sigma T is potential density referenced to ocean surface.
mlotst.long_name: Ocean Mixed Layer Thickness Defined by Sigma T

mlotstsq.long_name: Square of Ocean Mixed Layer Thickness Defined by Sigma T

msftbarot.comment: Streamfunction or its approximation for free surface models. See OMDP document for details.

msftmrho.comment: Overturning mass streamfunction arising from all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

msftmrhompa.comment: CMIP5 called this 'due to Bolus Advection'.  Name change respects the more general physics of the mesoscale parameterizations.
msftmrhompa.long_name: ocean meridional overturning mass streamfunction due to parameterized mesoscale advection

msftmyz.comment: Overturning mass streamfunction arising from all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

msftmzmpa.comment: CMIP5 called this 'due to Bolus Advection'.  Name change respects the more general physics of the mesoscale parameterizations.
msftmzmpa.long_name: ocean meridional overturning mass streamfunction due to parameterized mesoscale advection

msftmzsmpa.comment: Report only if there is a submesoscale eddy parameterization.
msftmzsmpa.long_name: ocean meridional overturning mass streamfunction due to parameterized submesoscale advection

msftyrho.comment: Overturning mass streamfunction arising from all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

msftyrhompa.comment: CMIP5 called this 'due to Bolus Advection'.  Name change respects the more general physics of the mesoscale parameterizations.
msftyrhompa.long_name: ocean Y overturning mass streamfunction due to parameterized mesoscale advection

msftyyz.comment: Overturning mass streamfunction arising from all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.

msftyzmpa.comment: CMIP5 called this 'due to Bolus Advection'.  Name change respects the more general physics of the mesoscale parameterizations.
msftyzmpa.long_name: ocean Y overturning mass streamfunction due to parameterized mesoscale advection

msftyzsmpa.comment: Report only if there is a submesoscale eddy parameterization.
msftyzsmpa.long_name: ocean Y overturning mass streamfunction due to parameterized submesoscale advection

nh4.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

no3.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

o2.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

o2min.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea depth: minimum

ocfriver.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
ocfriver.comment: Organic Carbon supply to ocean through runoff (separate from gas exchange)
ocfriver.long_name: Flux of Organic Carbon Into Ocean Surface by Runoff

p0.long_name: vertical coordinate formula term: reference pressure

pbo.long_name: Sea Water Pressure at Sea floor

ph.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
ph.comment: negative log of hydrogen ion concentration with the concentration expressed as mol H kg-1.

phyc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
phyc.comment: sum of phytoplankton carbon component concentrations.  In most (all?) cases this is the sum of phycdiat and phycmisc (i.e., 'Diatom Carbon Concentration' and 'Non-Diatom Phytoplankton Carbon Concentration'

phycalc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
phycalc.comment: carbon concentration from calcareous (calcite-producing) phytoplankton component alone
phycalc.long_name: Mole Concentration of Calcareous Phytoplankton expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

phydiat.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
phydiat.comment: carbon from the diatom phytoplankton component concentration alone
phydiat.long_name: Mole Concentration of Diatoms expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

phydiaz.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
phydiaz.comment: carbon concentration from the diazotrophic phytoplankton component alone
phydiaz.long_name: Mole Concentration of Diazotrophs Expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

phyfe.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
phyfe.comment: sum of phytoplankton iron component concentrations

phymisc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
phymisc.comment: carbon concentration from additional phytoplankton component alone
phymisc.long_name: Mole Concentration of Miscellaneous Phytoplankton expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

phyn.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
phyn.comment: sum of phytoplankton nitrogen component concentrations

phyp.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

phypico.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
phypico.comment: carbon concentration from the picophytoplankton (<2 um) component alone
phypico.long_name: Mole Concentration of Picophytoplankton expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

physi.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
physi.comment: sum of phytoplankton silica component concentrations

po4.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

poc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
poc.comment: sum of particulate organic carbon component concentrations

pon.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
pon.comment: sum of particulate organic nitrogen component concentrations

pop.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
pop.comment: sum of particulate organic phosphorus component concentrations

pp.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
pp.comment: total primary (organic carbon) production by phytoplankton

pr.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where ice_free_sea over sea
pr.comment: includes both liquid and solid phases
pr.long_name: Rainfall Flux where Ice Free Ocean over Sea

prsn.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where ice_free_sea over sea
prsn.comment: at surface; includes precipitation of all forms of water in the solid phase
prsn.long_name: Snowfall Flux where Ice Free Ocean over Sea

pso.long_name: Sea Water Pressure at Sea Water Surface

rlds.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where ice_free_sea over sea
rlds.comment: This is defined as 'where ice_free_sea over sea'

rsdo.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
rsdo.long_name: Downwelling Shortwave Radiation in Sea Water

rsntds.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
rsntds.comment: This is the flux into the surface of liquid sea water only. This excludes shortwave flux absorbed by sea ice, but includes any light that passes through the ice and is absorbed by the ocean.
rsntds.long_name: Net Downward Shortwave Radiation at Sea Water Surface

sf6.long_name: Moles Per Unit Mass of SF6 in Sea Water

sfdsi.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
sfdsi.comment: This field is physical, and it arises since sea ice has a nonzero salt content, so it exchanges salt with the liquid ocean upon melting and freezing.
sfdsi.long_name: Downward Sea Ice Basal Salt Flux

sfriver.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
sfriver.comment: This field is physical, and it arises when rivers carry a nonzero salt content.  Often this is zero, with rivers assumed to be fresh.
sfriver.long_name: Salt Flux into Sea Water from Rivers

si.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

sltovgyre.comment: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.
sltovgyre.long_name: Northward Ocean Salt Transport due to Gyre

sltovovrt.comment: From all advective mass transport processes, resolved and parameterized.
sltovovrt.long_name: Northward Ocean Salt Transport due to Overturning

sob.comment: Model prognostic salinity at bottom-most model grid cell
sob.long_name: sea water salinity at sea floor

soga.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea

somint.comment: Full column sum of density*cell thickness*prognostic salinity. If the model is Boussinesq, then use Boussinesq reference density for the density factor.
somint.long_name: integral wrt depth of product of sea water density and prognostic salinity

spco2.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
spco2.long_name: Surface Aqueous Partial Pressure of CO2

talk.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
talk.comment: total alkalinity equivalent concentration (including carbonate, nitrogen, silicate, and borate components)

talknat.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
talknat.comment: total alkalinity equivalent concentration (including carbonate, borate, phosphorus, silicon, and nitrogen components) at preindustrial atmospheric xCO2

tauucorr.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
tauucorr.comment: This is the stress on the liquid ocean from overlying atmosphere, sea ice, ice shelf, etc.

tauuo.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
tauuo.comment: This is the stress on the liquid ocean from overlying atmosphere, sea ice, ice shelf, etc.

tauvcorr.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
tauvcorr.comment: This is the stress on the liquid ocean from overlying atmosphere, sea ice, ice shelf, etc.

tauvo.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
tauvo.comment: This is the stress on the liquid ocean from overlying atmosphere, sea ice, ice shelf, etc.

thetao.comment: Diagnostic should be contributed even for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field.

thetaoga.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
thetaoga.comment: Diagnostic should be contributed even for models using conservative temperature as prognostic field
thetaoga.long_name: Global Average Sea Water Potential Temperature

tob.comment: Potential temperature at the ocean bottom-most grid cell.
tob.long_name: Sea Water Potential Temperature at Sea Floor

tomint.comment: Full column sum of density*cell thickness*prognostic temperature. If the model is Boussinesq, then use Boussinesq reference density for the density factor.
tomint.long_name: integral wrt depth of product of sea water density and prognostic temperature

tos.comment: this may differ from 'surface temperature' in regions of sea ice.

tosga.comment: This may differ from 'surface temperature' in regions of sea ice.This may differ from 'surface temperature' in regions of sea ice.For models using conservative temperature as prognostic field, they should report the SST as surface potent

tossq.comment: square of temperature of liquid ocean, averaged over the day.

umo.comment: X-ward mass transport from resolved and parameterized advective transport.

uo.comment: Prognostic x-ward velocity component resolved by the model.

vmo.comment: Y-ward mass transport from resolved and parameterized advective transport.

vo.comment: Prognostic x-ward velocity component resolved by the model.

volo.cell_measures: time: mean area: sum where sea

vsf.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
vsf.comment: It is set to zero in models which receive a real water flux.
vsf.long_name: Virtual Salt Flux into Sea Water

vsfcorr.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
vsfcorr.comment: It is set to zero in models which receive a real water flux.

vsfevap.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
vsfevap.comment: zero for models using real water fluxes.
vsfevap.long_name: Virtual Salt Flux into Sea Water due to Evaporation

vsfpr.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
vsfpr.comment: zero for models using real water fluxes.
vsfpr.long_name: Virtual Salt Flux into Sea Water due to Rainfall

vsfriver.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
vsfriver.comment: zero for models using real water fluxes.
vsfriver.long_name: Virtual Salt Flux into Sea Water From Rivers

vsfsit.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
vsfsit.comment: This variable measures the virtual salt flux into sea water due to the melting of sea ice. It is set to zero in models which receive a real water flux.
vsfsit.long_name: Virtual Salt Flux into Sea Water due to Sea Ice Thermodynamics

wfcorr.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
wfcorr.comment: Positive flux implies correction adds water to ocean.

wfo.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
wfo.comment: computed as the water  flux into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.  This is the sum of the next two variables in this table.

wfonocorr.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
wfonocorr.comment: computed as the water  flux (without flux correction) into the ocean divided by the area of the ocean portion of the grid cell.
wfonocorr.long_name: Water Flux into Sea Water Without Flux Correction

wmo.comment: Upward mass transport from resolved and parameterized advective transport.

zfull.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
zfull.long_name: Depth Below Geoid of Ocean Layer

zhalf.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
zhalf.long_name: Depth Below Geoid of Interfaces Between Ocean Layers

zo2min.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
zo2min.comment: Depth of vertical minimum concentration of dissolved oxygen gas (if two, then the shallower)

zooc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
zooc.comment: sum of zooplankton carbon component concentrations

zoocmisc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
zoocmisc.comment: carbon from additional zooplankton component concentrations alone (e.g. Micro, meso).  Since the models all have different numbers of components, this variable has been included to provide a check for intercomparison between models since some phytoplankton groups are supersets.

zoomeso.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
zoomeso.comment: carbon  concentration from mesozooplankton (20-200 um) component alone
zoomeso.long_name: Mole Concentration of Mesozooplankton expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

zoomicro.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
zoomicro.comment: carbon  concentration from the microzooplankton (<20 um) component alone
zoomicro.long_name: Mole Concentration of Microzooplankton expressed as Carbon in Sea Water

zos.comment: This is the dynamic sea level, so should have zero global area mean. It should not include inverse barometer depressions from sea ice.

zossq.long_name: Square of Sea Surface Height Above Geoid

zostoga.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
zostoga.comment: There is no CMIP6 request for zosga nor zossga.
zostoga.long_name: Global Average Thermosteric Sea Level Change

zsatarag.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
zsatarag.comment: Depth of aragonite saturation horizon (0 if undersaturated at all depths, 'missing' if supersaturated at all depths; if multiple horizons exist, the shallowest should be taken).

zsatcalc.cell_measures: time: mean area: mean where sea
zsatcalc.comment: Depth of calcite saturation horizon (0 if undersaturated at all depths, and missing saturated through whole depth; if two or more horizons exist, then the shallowest is reported)
